body: The random snippets of script that write across the surface of this parchment-colored eyeless mask hint at the knowledge of the many tomes stored within. The mask grants its wearer a +10 competence bonus on all Knowledge skill checks, but the wearer is blinded while wearing the mask. The mask must be worn for 10 minutes before the wearer gains its bonus.
name: Mask Of A Thousand Tomes
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Head/Head Slot Wondrous Items/Mask Of A Thousand Tomes
